Acrobats perform feats of agility, balance, and strength. The acrobat is a 5th-level challenge for contests of acrobatics and the like. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Acrobat](/NPCs.aspx?ID=940) **Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 236 **Perception** +6 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Circus Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +5, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +1 **Steady Balance** When the acrobat rolls a success on an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check, they get a critical success instead. They aren't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) when attempting to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=28) and can attempt an Acrobatics check instead of a Reflex save to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95). **Items** [Climbing Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (5), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +12 **Will** +4 **HP** 28 **Cat Fall** The acrobat treats all falls as 50 feet shorter.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** The acrobat is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see; **Effect** The acrobat gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **Melee** foot +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning **Ranged** dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The acrobat deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Swinging Strike** The acrobat swings on a rope or trapeze, moving up to double their Speed. At any point during the swing, they can make a melee Strike.
